rooms.description: Large entrance hall with Vastu compliant north or east facing opening to welcome positive energy.
Guest lobby for visitors with seating area; designed according to Vastu norms with proper east/west orientation.
Spacious living room with open layout for family gatherings; Vastu compliant south or east facing entrance.
Open dining area adjoining the living room; designed with Vastu guidelines in mind for balanced energy.
Fully equipped kitchen placed in the east corner for auspicious energy and ease of access; Vastu compliant layout.
Large family room with multiple seating arrangements for joint family members; designed with Vastu principles to encourage harmony.
Three master bedrooms; each bedroom is placed according to Vastu norms ensuring good energy flow and privacy.
Modern bathroom with dual sinks; Vastu compliant placement for relaxation and positive energy.

openings.description: Vastu compliant entrance facing east or north to welcome positive energy.
Large windows overlooking the garden to ensure natural light and ventilation in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
Balcony providing access to the garden; placed on the east side for auspicious energy as per Vastu.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom; oriented according to Vastu guidelines for good health and prosperity.
Second master bedroom with private balcony overlooking the garden; designed following Vastu principles for enhanced well-being.
Third master bedroom with ample natural light and proper Vastu alignment to promote relaxation.
Dedicated study room for the joint family; placed in a quiet corner as per Vastu norms to boost concentration.
Additional bathroom for the first floor; designed with adequate ventilation and Vastu compliant location to enhance relaxation.

openings.description: Main staircase connecting both floors; designed with Vastu compliant dimensions and placement.
Balconies integrated into master bedrooms ensuring ample natural light per Vastu principles.

garden.description: Expansive garden with native landscaping, water features for tranquility and natural cooling; designed according to Vastu principles to enhance positive energy around the villa.
